png.description: Specify OptiPNG and PNGquant options together.

q.description: Alias of `quality`. Specify a number, `1`–`100`, to set the fallback quality when none is specified.

quality.description: Specify a number, `1`–`100`, to set the fallback quality when none is specified.

svg.description: Alias of `svgo`. Override SVGO default settings.
